web.homepage.tagline1.en: Paste a password, secret message or private link below.
web.homepage.tagline1.translation: Indsæt en adgangskode, besked eller privat link nedenfor.

web.homepage.tagline2.en: Keep sensitive info out of your email and chat logs.
web.homepage.tagline2.translation: Hold følsomme oplysninger ude af dine e-mails og chats.

web.homepage.secret_hint.en: * A secret link only works once and then disappears forever.
web.homepage.secret_hint.translation: * Et sikkert link virker kun én gang og forsvinder derefter for altid.

web.homepage.secret_form_more_text3.en: and be able to send the secret by email.
web.homepage.secret_form_more_text3.translation: og få mulighed for at sende sikre links via e-mail.

web.homepage.cta_subtitle.en: Elevate your brand and share with confidence
web.homepage.cta_subtitle.translation: Styrk dit brand og del med selvtillid

web.homepage.need_free_account.en: Just getting started? Send emails with a free account.
web.homepage.need_free_account.translation: Lige begyndt? Send e-mails med en gratis konto.

web.homepage.password_generation_descrip.en: Click "Generate Password" to create a secure random password that you can share.
web.homepage.password_generation_descrip.translation: Klik på "Generate Password" for at oprette en sikker, tilfældig adgangskode, som du kan dele.

web.homepage.protip1.en: Your message will self-destruct after being viewed. The link can only be accessed once.
web.homepage.protip1.translation: Din besked vil ødelægge sig selv, når den er blevet set. Linket kan kun tilgås én gang.

web.homepage.authonly.tagline2.en: Secure messaging service is for internal use only.
web.homepage.authonly.tagline2.translation: Den sikre beskedtjeneste er kun til intern brug.

web.homepage.authonly.tagline1.en: If you have an account, please log in to continue.
web.homepage.authonly.tagline1.translation: Hvis du har en konto, skal du logge ind for at fortsætte.

web.homepage.disabled.tagline2.en: This service is setup for internal use only.
web.homepage.disabled.tagline2.translation: Denne tjeneste er kun sat op til intern brug.

web.homepage.disabled.tagline1.en: User interface and login capabilities are not available.
web.homepage.disabled.tagline1.translation: Brugergrænseflade og login-funktioner er ikke tilgængelige.

web.homepage.secure_your_brand_build_cus.en: Secure your brand, build customer trust with links from your domain.
web.homepage.secure_your_brand_build_cus.translation: Sikre dit brand, opbyg kundernes tillid med links fra dit domæne.

web.homepage.a_trusted_way_to_share_sens.en: A trusted way to share sensitive information that self-destructs after being viewed.
web.homepage.a_trusted_way_to_share_sens.translation: En pålidelig måde at dele følsomme oplysninger på, som selvdestruerer, når de er blevet set.

web.homepage.send_sensitive_information_.en: Send sensitive information that can only be viewed once
web.homepage.send_sensitive_information_.translation: Send følsomme oplysninger, der kun kan ses én gang

web.homepage.this_is_a_private_instance_.en: This is a private instance. Only authorized team members can generate new secure links.
web.homepage.this_is_a_private_instance_.translation: Dette er en privat instans. Kun autoriserede teammedlemmer kan generere nye sikre links.

web.homepage.onetime_secret_helps_us_sha.en: Onetime Secret helps us share sensitive information securely while maintaining our professional facade.
web.homepage.onetime_secret_helps_us_sha.translation: Onetime Secret hjælper os med at dele følsomme oplysninger sikkert, mens vi bevarer vores professionelle facade.

web.homepage.information_shared_through_.en: Information shared through this service can only be accessed once. Once viewed, the content is permanently deleted to ensure confidentiality.
web.homepage.information_shared_through_.translation: Oplysninger, der deles via denne tjeneste, kan kun tilgås én gang. Når indholdet er set, slettes det permanent for at sikre fortrolighed.
